name: facade
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, this move has double power.
short_effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
